name: TextureCooccurrenceFeatures
author: Unknown
description: Calculates texture co-occurrence features such as Energy, Entropy, Inverse Difference Moment, Inertia, Cluster Shade, and Cluster Prominence from an input image.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the input image, e.g., 2 for 2D images, 3 for 3D images.

inputs.name: Input Image
inputs.description: The input image file for which texture co-occurrence features will be calculated.

inputs.name: Number of Bins Per Axis
inputs.description: The number of bins per axis to be used in the histogram for texture calculation. Defaults to 256.

inputs.name: Mask Image
inputs.description: Optional mask image to specify the regions of interest in the input image for which features will be calculated.

inputs.name: Mask Label
inputs.description: Label value in the mask image to specify which region to process. Defaults to 1.

output-files.name: Features Output
output-files.description: The output file containing the calculated texture co-occurrence features.
